sections.subtitle: Origins
sections.content: I'm not the typical developer. A long time ago, my journey began — over 20 years ago — as a young padawan discovering the early powers of visuals, motion, and detail. First came pixel-perfect layouts, smooth interactions, and interfaces that felt alive. Then came the other side — solving challenges, building integrations, and connecting systems. Some call it the dark side of development. I call it balance.

sections.subtitle: Now
sections.content: Today, I walk the path of product design — blending strategy, UX thinking and fullstack execution. It's not just about how to build — but what, why and for whom.

sections.subtitle: Forward
sections.content: Learning never stops. I stay curious, adaptable and ready for what's next. I believe in building things that last — products with purpose and tools I'd want to use myself.

portfolio.title: Plancito.com
portfolio.description: Plancito.com is a social event planning app designed to simplify group gatherings. It allows users to create events, manage invites, collaborate on playlists, split expenses, and organize tasks seamlessly.
portfolio.challenge: Building a collaborative, real-time platform that handles multiple event management features while keeping the UX intuitive and mobile-friendly.
portfolio.solution: Implemented a full-stack solution with React, Supabase, and TailwindCSS, integrating real-time updates, expense tracking, and task management features into a cohesive user experience.

feedback.author: Deiv
feedback.text: Plancito.com is the product of my passion for building tools that make social planning effortless and fun.

portfolio.title: Gymstagram
portfolio.description: Gymstagram is a community-driven fitness social network where users can share workouts, progress photos, and motivate each other with challenges and achievements.
portfolio.challenge: Creating a performant, engaging social platform focused on fitness, while ensuring privacy and smooth multimedia content sharing.
portfolio.solution: Developed the app using Next.js and Firebase, enabling real-time chats, media uploads, gamification features, and a scalable backend to handle growth.

feedback.author: Fitness Startup CEO
feedback.text: Gymstagram transformed our community engagement and grew our user base exponentially.

portfolio.title: Turnogram
portfolio.description: Turnogram is a platform to manage appointments for professionals and studios, enabling booking, calendar sync, payment integration, and client management.
portfolio.challenge: Building a flexible and scalable appointment system supporting multiple professions, time zones, and payment gateways.
portfolio.solution: Developed using Next.js, Node.js, and integrated MercadoPago API for seamless payments. The system supports multi-user roles and dynamic scheduling rules.

feedback.author: Turnogram Product Manager
feedback.text: Turnogram streamlined our booking process and significantly improved customer satisfaction.

portfolio.title: WordPress Plugins & Headless Landings
portfolio.description: Development of custom WordPress plugins to extend CMS capabilities, combined with headless JavaScript frontends for high-performance landing pages.
portfolio.challenge: Balancing the power of WordPress backend flexibility with modern, fast frontend experiences using React and Astro.
portfolio.solution: Built plugins with PHP and ACF, while creating decoupled frontends with React and Astro for lightning-fast page loads and improved SEO.

feedback.author: Various Clients
feedback.text: The combination of WordPress flexibility with modern frontend performance has been a game-changer for our projects.
